H.E. Justin Sun 孙宇晨: 对于HT市场波动所导致杠杆穿仓损失，火必平台将全额承担。对于少数用户杠杆清算所造成盘面波动影响，我们深表歉意，为了进一步提升火必平台多币种流动性，我们将出资1亿美元成立流动性基金，持续改善主流币，HT流动性深度，加强杠杆预警与流动性能力，对于本次事件，我们会就后续进展与社区保持同步。

RT Austin Campbell 1/ I’m consistently amazed at the lack of basic knowledge of financial plumbing proudly shouted on Twitter. Signet is an internal ledger at SBNY. You have to KYC to onboard and they do monitor account activity. More so, a transfer using Signet is moving money from
DIRTY BUBBLE MEDIA: FUD YOU!: SIGNET, Signature’s no-oversight transfer service for hundreds of crypto companies, included many known and alleged frauds: - FTX and Alameda - Binance - Genesis Block OTC - Bithumb - Blockfi - Huobi … and many more.
